code: import axios from"axios";import*as constants from"./constants";import{fromJS}from"immutable";axios.defaults.withCredentials=true;export var registerSuccessAction=function registerSuccessAction(result){return{type:constants.REGISTER_SUCCESS,result:result};};export var register=function register(account,password){return function(dispatch){axios.post("http://35.229.221.230:3000/users/register",{username:account,password:password}).then(function(res){console.log(res);var result=res.data.succsess;if(result){dispatch(registerSuccessAction(1));}else{dispatch(registerSuccessAction(2));}}).catch(function(err){dispatch(registerSuccessAction(2));});};};
